xten.name: quickplay

event.name: click
event.code:
<%
                        const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
                        const demo = urlParams.get('demo') == 'yes';

                        if (demo) {
                            const file = await wxfns.selectFile('video/*');
                            const url = URL.createObjectURL(file);
                            const parent = wxfns.closestXten(event.target, 'quickplay');
                            const img = parent.querySelector('video');
                            img.setAttribute('src', url);
                            return;
                        }
                    %>

xten.initElement:
<%
        const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        const demo = urlParams.get('demo') == 'yes';

        if (demo) {
            wxfns.addClass(element, 'wx-state-editable');
            return;
        }

        element.setAttribute('src', element.querySelector('video').getAttribute('src'));
    %>
